name: Vialog
description:
Vialog is a video review startup that provides community engagement tools for businesses.

Our mission is to fix online reviews with video: text reviews are broken, they have low information intensity, they are easy to fake and lack diversity.

*European Film Market startup 2018 — Berlinale Film Festival
*ARTICONF partner — EU commissioned project for decentralised social media
*Recently piloted at category A film festival Black Nights with 80,000 attendees

team.title: CEO
team.name: David Sarlos
team.bioHtml: founder @Vialog - video comments. co-founder @CinefilCo. • Worked at @MUBI • Studied at @London Film School, London. world cinema strategist turned entrepreneur

team.name: Jeremiah Smith
team.bioHtml: Founder @ Flashbackr, Startup Tracker, The DX Network • Math/CS BSc @ McGill, MSc PhD in AI @ Imperial College
